Articles.Content:
Simple. What are Jeb, Bill and Bob doing now ? Are they orbiting the sun ? Stuck in EVA ?

For me, all of them are alive at space center.

For now.
Jeb has been dead since August on my current save, Bill is on an outpost I'm building on Minmus.

All of them are alive, but Jeb was very close to being dead once I lifted off of the Mun I ran out of fuel and didn't get a stable orbit around the Mun, so I packed up all of my 10 experiments (Which in total was worth 300 or so science) then I used the EVA fuel to get out of the Muns SOI and then I used it again to slingshot myself directly back to Kerbin, Jeb landed on a patch of land so he bounced off of his butt and remained alive, I'm lucky that he didn't hit the water or else he would've died. EDIT: oh and I only had 0.14/5.00 EVA fuel left.
